alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Louisa, northwestern Goochland, northwestern Hanover and northeastern Fluvanna Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kents Store, or near Hadensville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Mineral, Hadensville, Ferncliff, Bumpass, Kents Store, Orchid, Louisa Airport, Tabscott, Trevilians, Wares Crossroads, Wilmington, Dixie, Pendleton, Stage Junction, Mabelton, Cuckoo, Caledonia, Bybee and Yanceyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and north central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
